actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to remove the reduction in the amount of Survivor Benefit Plan annuities at age 62.

summary.text: Amends Federal provisions concerning military annuities under the Survivor Benefit Plan (SBP) to: (1) increase the SBP annuity for beneficiaries age 62 or older from 35 to 55 percent of the base amount of military retired pay; and (2) repeal the Supplemental Survivor Benefit Plan program.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to remove the reduction in the amount of Survivor Benefit Plan annuities at age 62.
